items.q: Which famous document begins with 'We the People'?
items.explanation: It established America's national government and fundamental laws.

items.q: Cleopatra was a queen of Ancient Egypt.
items.explanation: She was the last active ruler of the Ptolemaic Kingdom of Egypt.

items.q: The Wright brothers invented the first successful airplane.
items.explanation: They achieved the first powered flight in 1903.

items.q: What global conflict lasted from 1914 to 1918?
items.explanation: It was known as the Great War at the time.

items.q: What American holiday celebrates the Pilgrims' harvest feast of 1621?
items.explanation: It is celebrated on the fourth Thursday of November.

items.q: Which US president is pictured on the one-dollar bill?
items.explanation: He is deeply revered as the father of the country.

items.q: What ancient device was used in China to calculate numbers using sliding beads?
items.explanation: It is an ancient calculating tool.

items.q: Which famous nurse came to prominence during the Crimean War?
items.explanation: She is considered the founder of modern nursing.

items.q: Name the period of global economic decline that began in 1929.
items.explanation: It started after a major stock market crash in the US.

items.q: What legendary ancient city was infiltrated using a giant wooden horse?
items.explanation: The 'Trojan Horse' allowed Greek soldiers to enter the city.
